title: The Seekers (Daniel J. Boorstin)
description:
Title: The Seekers - The Story of Man's Continuing Quest to Understand His World
Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Narrator: Denis deBoisblanc
Format: Abridged Audiobook (MP3) + Unabridged Ebook (PDF)

The third and final volume of historian Daniel J. Boorstin's "Knowledge Trilogy". The first volume, The Discoverers, covers explorers, scientists, and historians in their quest for raw knowledge. The second volume, The Creators, describes writers, painters, and composers in their pursuit of inspiring art. The third and final volume, The Seekers, describes people searching for an understanding of human existence itself
